definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinicopathological feature and prognosis of meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究腦膜瘤臨牀病理特徵及預後。

sentences.english: Psychopathological classifications, which emphasize the mother-child relationships, are essential reference marks.
sentences.chinese: 心理病理學分類，着重於母子關係是必要的參考標準。

sentences.english: Objective:To discuss the clinical and pathologic characteristics and effective treatment of renal tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腎結核的臨牀和病理特徵及其有效治療方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate clinical and pathological feature of death cases due to pericardial tamponade.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討因心包填塞死亡的臨牀與病理特徵。

sentences.english: Zheng-hou refer to pathologic generalization of organism in certain phase of developing disease.
sentences.chinese: 證候是機體在疾病發展過程中的某一階段的病理概括。

sentences.english: The theory of yin and yang serves to explain the organic structure physiologicing changes of the human body.
sentences.chinese: 五行學說能夠評釋人體的生理功效和病理形態。

sentences.english: In addition, the necrosis of spleen, bursa of Fabricius, thymus and convoluted tubular epithelia of kidney was seen.
sentences.chinese: 腎曲小管上皮細胞嚴重變性壞死等病理變化。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the pathological characteristics of heroin spongiform leukoencephalopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解海洛因海綿狀白質腦病的病理特徵。

sentences.english: Courses include molecular biology, pathobiology, viral pathogenesis, and related topics.
sentences.chinese: 分子生物，病理學，病毒發病機理和相關主題。

sentences.english: Hydropic degeneration and focal necrosis can be found by microscope in the dosage groups.
sentences.chinese: 病理組織學檢查，光鏡下可見水樣變性及小塊壞死竈。

sentences.english: If CD31 stains vessels, that is what we expected. We need a pathologist with pediatric pathology background to explain this case.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要有兒科病理知識的病理學者來解釋這個病例。

sentences.english: If CD31 stains vessels, that is what we expected. We need a pathologist with pediatric pathology background to explain this case.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要有兒科病理知識的病理學者來解釋這個病例。

sentences.english: On pathological evaluation most of hematomas were old and organized.
sentences.chinese: 病理顯示血腫多爲陳舊性和機化。

sentences.english: Methods The imaging findings and pathologic characteristics of 31 patients with EGB were analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧分析31例EGB的影像表現及病理特徵。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the pathomorphological characteristics of acute bromadiolone poisoning in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察豚鼠食人溴敵隆急性中毒的病理形態學特點。

sentences.english: The skin biopsy specimen showed the histologic features of epidermolytic hyperkeratosis .
sentences.chinese: 病理組織檢驗可見到表皮裂解角質增厚的表現。

definition: biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
Western medicine/a doctor trained in Western medicine
